name: Big Elephant Simulator: Wild African Animal 3D
name_original: Big Elephant Simulator: Wild African Animal 3D
description:
Be an elephant in Big Elephant Simulator!

African elephant in the simulator is like the real animal! Elephant can fight with a giant crocodile or a lion. And your animal can do it in our survival simulator! Don't wait! Listen to the nature, deep into African elephant life and survival. Never played animal simulator games? Try our simulator right now. There are tutorial and easy animal controls inside. Explore the locations and challenge friends.

Features of Big Elephant Simulator:

- African elephant family
- Many animal species
- Survival and quests
- 3D graphics
- Survival atmosphere
- Animal behaviour simulator

Ride a elephant across African simulator's lands, adventures are waiting for your survival! Fight with predatory animals you meet or go away. Survival is not easy for animal, so maintain your African elephant energy in the simulator. Upgrade your animal and finish all quests - in the survival simulator they can be challenging, but cool.

Find an animal mate and breed a new African elephant. Get a elephant family, it is important for your survival: there are many animal species in the survival simulator. Have your own African animal, that you can feed, ride and play with!
Try how to be an African animal in elephant survival simulator. Complete funny quests and levelup your elephant to open new survival skills. Explore the African locations and fight for your survival.

Avoid big lions or find how to survive against them. Animals can be really dangerous in the survival simulator. Finish quests, help your African elephant. Try it, 3D graphics makes the animal survival simulator even more interesting!

Enjoy Big Elephant Simulator!
